title: Traits and Features
content: rs. Wizard Lvl 1 Druid Lvl 1 Dart Proficiency Feature Add your Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls with Darts. Wizard Lvl 1 Druid Lvl 1 Sling Proficiency Feature Add your Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls with Slings. Wizard Lvl 1 Druid Lvl 1 Light Crossbow Proficiency Feature Add your Proficiency Bonus to Attack Rolls with Light Crossbows.
